item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! This is an open source recipe website. Setup Some fun facts about the setup of this project include: Built with Quiqr and Hugo Hosted for free on GitHub Pages Developed using Vim, while listening to a variety of great tracks Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub. Cheers üçí

item.title: Cauliflower steaks with roasted red pepper & olive salsa
item.description: Unlock the flavours of cauliflower with a red pepper, olive and caper salsa, topped with almonds. Healthy and vegan, it makes a tasty light lunch or supper. Heat oven to 220C/200C fan/gas 7 and line a baking tray with baking parchment. Slice the cauliflower into two 1-inch steaks ‚Äì use the middle part as it‚Äôs larger, and save the rest for another time. Rub the paprika and 1‚ÅÑ2 tbsp oil over the steaks and season.
